snippet: RHEIN--Miriam, December 26, 1917 - February 17, 2016. Beloved mother of Alan and Alice Rhein, and Barbara and Allan Kramer. Devoted grandmother of Kevin, Kim, Kerri, Peter, Jodi, Michael, Ricki and Dave. Cherished great-grandmoth-er of Alexander, Charlie, Maxwell, Matthew and Lucas. Loved by all who knew her and by all whose lives she touched. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RHEIN--Miriam, December 26, 1917 - February 17, 2016. Beloved mother of Alan and Alice Rhein, and Barbara and Allan Kramer.
